# Story TEA-TEST-001: Example Story

## Status
In Progress

## Story

**As a** developer,
**I want** to parse markdown stories,
**So that** I can extract structured data.

## Acceptance Criteria

1. Parse headings correctly
2. Extract checklist items
3. Detect variables
